title: Study Skills for Successful Students by Fred Orr
description:
Studying successfully at high school, college or university requires more than discipline, diligence and determination. Students must also come to grips with a crucial range of essential skills if they wish to turn toil into triumph.
Study Skills for Successful Students shows you how to improve your learnings skills and performance by:
. Increasing your motivation and concentration
. Improving your goal planning and time management
. Keeping healthy and preventing stress
. Enhancing your lecture listening and note-taking skills
. Becoming a more efficient reader
. Improving your essay writing
. Organising your revision
. Learning how to perform more effectively in exams
Study Skills for Successful Students is down-to-earth and readable, and is crammed with instructive case studies. Each chapter features practical exercises designed to hone your new skills so that you can achieve maximum performance.
